author: awiner
msg: SHINDIG-753: Radically simplify the Persistence/AppData API
- Add support for an appData parameter to the fetch-person and fetch-people JS APIs
- Add JsonDbOpensocialService support for appData and appData.key fields on person objects
- Add end-to-end tests of appdata retrieval
New APIs - data pipelining and OS Lite - and the JSON-RPC and REST protocols will just use @fields.
No changes have been made to the service APIs (beyond adding the new appData key to Person)

author: elecharny
msg: Added the CSN classes in shared-ldap

author: rickhall
msg: Applied patch (FELIX-973) to add support for new operators in filter
